attributes.action: scrap the current passport which refers to the queen and replace it with a proper European one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We support the recent proposal to change the message on the UK passport to an extract from the EU constitution. It's about time we realised the debt of gratitude we owe our European partners in keeping us out of major wars since 1945. We should come out of our shells, get rid of the antiquated royal coat of arms on the front of our passports and replace it with the symbol of the future, the 12 stars on a blue background.
